name: StarBust (Delphergames)
description:
Turn Strategy game, you control 3 robots in their mission to save their ship reactor! Instructions:

Every turn consists of 2 actions:

  • Move action: you click a tile you can see within range, the character will try to move there according to their movement range
  • Attack Action: you click the tile where a enemy is located in order to attack (if there is nothing around, you still need to click somewhere to end your turn!!)

There are items all across the map, if you get them with the correct character, you will have a powerup or a consumable item!
